Recession Execucomp An indicator variable that equals one if a managerÃ¢â¬â¢s birth year plus 24 is a recession year (Schoar and Zuo 2017). Recession years are based on the business cycle dating database of the National Bureau of Economic Research (NBER). Recession years include the trough of the business cycle and all years leading to the trough (excluding the peak of the business cycle).
